name: Shyam Patel
intro: I am a dedicated and passionate IT professional with a strong foundation in web development, data analysis, and software testing. I thrive on solving complex problems and continuously learning new technologies to enhance my skill set. My goal is to leverage my technical expertise and creativity to build innovative solutions that drive business success and improve user experiences.
education: Advanced Diploma in Computer Programming - Seneca Polytechnic College

services.name: Web Development
services.description: I specialize in building highly responsive, fast, and scalable websites using React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. From landing pages to full-stack applications, I ensure optimal user experiences.

services.name: Data Analysis
services.description: Leveraging Python, SQL, and data visualization tools, I analyze complex datasets to extract valuable insights and drive data-driven decisions. I am skilled in data cleaning, transformation, and visualization.

services.name: Software Testing
services.description: Ensuring high-quality, bug-free applications with thorough manual and automated testing techniques. I focus on improving software efficiency, security, and reliability.

projects.name: Fragments API Server
projects.description: Built and deployed a production-ready cloud-native Fragments API Server with a complete Progressive Web Application frontend on AWS. The system supports full CRUD operations for multiple fragment formats (text, JSON, images) with real-time format conversion, offline capabilities, and secure authentication. Designed as a fully containerized microservices architecture using Docker, Amazon ECS, DynamoDB, S3, and Cognito, ensuring scalability and zero-downtime deployments with CI/CD through GitHub Actions.

projects.name: Backend System
projects.description: Built a comprehensive video-sharing platform backend with secure user authentication, profile management, and video upload functionality. Implemented interactive features including comments, likes, subscriptions, and social updates, plus an analytics dashboard tracking user engagement metrics. Utilized MongoDB Atlas for data management and validated all API endpoints through comprehensive testing.

projects.name: Hotel Reservation System
projects.description: Developed a Java-based hotel reservation system using JavaFX with MVC architecture. Features dual interfaces: customer portal for booking with automatic payment calculation, and admin dashboard with full CRUD operations, discount management, and reporting analytics. Implemented SQLite for data persistence and Java Logger for system activity tracking.

projects.name: Expense Tracker App
projects.description: Developed Xpense expense tracker with Next.js/MongoDB stack, featuring secure authentication, categorized transaction management, and interactive analytics dashboard. Created financial insights including spending trends, category breakdowns, and income vs. savings analysis to support user budgeting decisions.

projects.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
projects.description: Developed Next.js web application for Metropolitan Museum art exploration with secure user authentication and MongoDB integration. Created advanced search capabilities, personalized user features (favorites, history tracking), and session management while consuming external API data for dynamic content delivery.

projects.name: Power BI Data Professional Survey Dashboard
projects.description: comprehensive Power BI dashboard analyzing survey data from 600+ data professionals. Implemented data modeling and interactive visualizations to showcase salary comparisons by role, work-life balance metrics, programming language preferences, and regional participation trends, delivering actionable insights for strategic workforce planning and decision-making.

projects.name: British Airways Customer Review Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Built interactive Tableau dashboard analyzing British Airways customer reviews across key service metrics including food quality, cabin staff service, seat comfort, and value. Developed visualizations for trend analysis, geographic rating distribution, aircraft performance comparisons, and traveler segmentation to identify improvement opportunities and enhance customer experience.

projects.name: Delivery Truck Route Testing Project
projects.description: Developed a C++ application to optimize delivery truck routes, conducting acceptance, integration, and logfile testing using Visual Studio for performance validation. Successfully uploaded the project to GitHub, demonstrating strong skills in testing, debugging, and collaborating on real-world software solutions.

projects.name: Shopping Cart System
projects.description: Engineered a robust shopping cart system using C++ and SQL, encompassing secure customer login, product validation, and efficient order processing functionalities. Integrated with an Oracle database to manage product data and streamline checkout operations, ensuring data integrity and optimized performance for high-volume transactions.

experience.description: I work as a tutor at Student Scholars, specializing in Web Development, Python, and Scratch. My goal is to provide personalized support to students, helping them work through challenges and fostering a love for coding. By resolving their doubts and guiding them through hands-on learning, I aim to make their experience engaging and enriching. Through teaching, I also continue to deepen my own knowledge of these subjects, making the learning process mutually beneficial.

Worked as a QA Tester focusing on comprehensive quality assurance across multiple product features using industry-standard tools like Selenium for automated testing and JIRA for bug tracking and project management. Conducted thorough functionality testing to ensure smooth performance, identified and documented bugs with clear reporting for development teams, and provided UI/UX improvement suggestions. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to maintain product consistency and reliability, while monitoring daily updates and retesting fixes to confirm stability. This role enhanced my attention to detail, effective cross-team communication skills, and understanding that quality assurance is an ongoing process integral to the entire development lifecycle.

Developed a responsive single-page React.js application to streamline contractor order management for electronic parts. Implemented categorized part listings with quantity input functionality and integrated automated email processing to send order data in table format. Successfully replaced manual ordering systems with a digital workflow, significantly improving operational efficiency and eliminating manual data entry for the client.

Worked as an AI Trainer ensuring AI-generated responses are accurate and aligned with user expectations. Responsibilities included reviewing text and code to improve AI performance, performing code validation, and training models to enhance content analysis and generation capabilities. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize AI efficiency and continuously refine models to meet high quality standards.

As a Sales Associate at 7-Eleven, I developed strong customer service skills by understanding and addressing customer needs. My role involved assisting customers with their purchases, handling cash transactions, and ensuring a smooth shopping experience. Through daily interactions, I learned how to communicate effectively, solve problems quickly, and adapt to various customer preferences. This experience has reinforced my ability to work under pressure, manage multiple tasks efficiently, and think critically. These skills are directly transferable to my career in IT, where problem-solving, attention to detail, and communication are key in developing software solutions and providing technical support.
